column2: University of the West of England, Bristol
column5: Imaginative and expertly-designed human resource management (HRM) is seen by today's leaders as central to an organisation's success. HR practitioners are an integral part of that success, and as recognition of the distinctive contribution of human resource management grows, it is increasingly valued, both as a career in its own right and as a foundation for careers in other branches of management.
column7: Home Annual (Year 1) Fee £3350 Home Annual (Year 2) Fee £4150 Home Annual (Year 3) Fee £2500
column9: 2 years 8 months part time (MSc), 2 years part time (PGDip)
